abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

data.api_base: API Base URL in Azure. Get this from the target URI under EndPoint in Azure AI Foundry or in the Azure portal (https://xyz.openai.azure.com)
data.api_version: API version. Get this from the target URI under EndPoint in Azure AI Foundry or in the Azure portal (2024-08-01-preview)
